DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate new drug work , many complex multidose study often require . The intent study use Ibuprofen example market pain relief drug validate simpler single dose model future assessment new pain drug .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Of Single Doses Of Ibuprofen In Patients With Osteoarthritis Of The Knee
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects diagnose primary Osteoarthritis knee . Have least 3 month symptom duration prior screen visit . Regular user prescribe nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) selective cyclooxygenase II ( COX2 ) inhibitor management knee pain . Pain walk flat surface within specific interval prior study start . Exclusion criterion : History hypersensitivity NSAIDS . Allergy Ibuprofen . Use assistive device cane knee brace . History specified diseases/illnesses . Abnormal blood test prestudy .
